price: Kwani! Sisi tunaweza hata kuziweka sawa sawa ncha za vidole vyake!
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ
footnotes: Hasha! Sisi tuna uweza wa kuviweka sawa hata vifupa vya vidole vyake vilivyo vurugika, wachilia mbali mafupa yake makubwa makubwa ya mwili wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
